27  template <typename T, ASTNode::ASTNodeKind NK, typename Derived>
28  void visitASTNodeList(const ASTNodeList<T, NK, Derived> *List);

30 #define GEN_VISIT_LIST_DECL(Derived) \
31  virtual void visit##Derived(const Derived *List);
32

40  virtual void visit##NodeName(const NodeName *) = 0;
41 
42  GEN_PURE_VISIT_ASTNODE_DECL(Decl)

48  GEN_PURE_VISIT_ASTNODE_DECL(ElementDirective)
49 
50 #undef GEN_PURE_VISIT_ASTNODE_DECL
51 
52 #define GEN_VISIT_ASTNODE_DECL(NodeName) \
53  virtual void visit##NodeName(const NodeName *);
54
